responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "533C534A4F11BBFDF313E7B50C6D2899", "If you need help deciphering complex texts or uncovering obscure knowledge, I\'m here to assist. While we wait to get supplies from Samia\'s Hope, I\'m willing to lend my skills to those in need. I\'m not just passionate about uncovering Verra\'s hidden histories, I\'m also fluent in several languages. Don\'t forget to chat with Farzaan if you haven\'t, he can tell you more about the Scholars Academy.")
name: DD_CSQ_0071_Monroe_4
